summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SkillFlow CRM & Billing Controller Dashboard. Backend API testing achieved 88.9% success rate (8/9 tests passed). Frontend testing confirmed all key features working correctly including landing page with Google Sign-in, dashboard with 5 financial metrics, 7-stage training roadmap, SDC cards with overdue counts, work orders with auto-calculated end dates, invoice variance tracking, and role-based access control.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 520 error when creating new work orders
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks new work order creation workflow
critical_bugs.details: Server returns Cloudflare 520 error - appears to be infrastructure/server issue rather than code issue

passed_tests: Landing page loads with Google Sign-in button
Dashboard shows 5 financial metrics (Total Portfolio: ₹18,67,800, Actual Billed: ₹12,19,400, Collected: ₹7,31,640, Outstanding: ₹4,87,760, Variance: 34.7%)
Dashboard shows Training Roadmap Progress with 7 stages (Mobilization to Placement)
SDC cards show overdue count and blockers (e.g., 'Waiting for attendance upload')
SDC Detail page shows Work Orders table with auto-calculated end dates
SDC Detail page shows Training Roadmap progress per stage with individual completion percentages
Invoice creation calculates variance correctly (30% variance shown in billing table)
Role-based access: HO users can see all centers and have access to 'New Work Order' button
Dashboard financial metrics display with attention badges for high variance and outstanding amounts
Training stages show proper progress tracking across all 7 phases
SDC cards display financial information (Portfolio, Outstanding, Collected amounts)
Navigation between dashboard and SDC detail pages works correctly
Billing tab shows invoices with variance tracking and payment status

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all UI elements and interactions working correctly)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix the 520 server error for work order creation endpoint (/api/work-orders). This appears to be an infrastructure issue with the server/Cloudflare configuration rather than a code issue. All other functionality is working correctly.
